description: Number of partitions of n such that all parts are neither relatively prime (cf. A000837) nor are they periodic with each part occurring the same number of times (cf. A024994).
mathematica: A000837[n_] := Sum[ MoebiusMu[n/d]*PartitionsP[d], {d, Divisors[n]}]; A024994[n_] := Sum[ PartitionsQ[k], {k, Divisors[n] // Most}]; a[n_] := PartitionsP[n] - (A000837[n] + A024994[n]); Table[a[n], {n, 1, 65}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Oct 03 2013 *)
author: _Alford Arnold_, Mar 16 2001
